## CompilerProps interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CompilerProps 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [additionalContext?](./stentor-utils.compilerprops.additionalcontext.md) | Record&lt;string, unknown&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> When provided, the additional context will be used when compiling the templates. This is an opportunity to inject more information beyond the provided request and context objects. |
|  [macros?](./stentor-utils.compilerprops.macros.md) | [MacroMap](./stentor-utils.macromap.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> When provided it overrides the DEFAULT\_MACROS and are used when compiling the templates.<!-- -->You can include the DEFAULT\_MACROS if you include them:
```ts
macros: {
   ...DEFAULT_MACROS,
   ...myMacros
}
```
 |
|  [replaceWhenUndefined?](./stentor-utils.compilerprops.replacewhenundefined.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> When true, it will replace the $<!-- -->{<!-- -->foo<!-- -->} with undefined. Default behavior will leave $<!-- -->{<!-- -->foo<!-- -->} if it does not have a value. |
